sections.header:
FREELANCE SERVICE AGREEMENT

This Freelance Service Agreement (the 'Agreement') is made on {date} between {client_name}, located at {client_address} (the 'Client'), and {freelancer_name}, located at {freelancer_address} (the 'Freelancer').
sections.jurisdiction:
6. Jurisdiction
This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of {jurisdiction}.
